job.title: Staff Software Engineer- Olive Helps
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongOlives AI workforce is built to fix our broken healthcare system by addressing healthcares most burdensome issues  delivering hospitals and health systems increased revenue reduced costs and increased capacity People feel lost in the system today and healthcare employees are essentially working in the dark due to outdated technology that creates a lack of shared knowledge and siloed data Olive is designed to drive connections shining a new light on the broken healthcare processes that stand between providers and patient care She uses AI to reveal lifechanging insights that make healthcare more efficient affordable and effective Olives vision is to unleash a trillion dollars of hidden potential within healthcare by connecting its disconnected systems Olive is improving healthcare operations today so everyone can benefit from a healthier industry tomorrowbrbrOlive Helps is healthcares AIpowered sidekick making the healthcare ecosystem more efficient Through a lightweight desktop application Olive Helps delivers realtime information to healthcare workers and she drives them directly to the taskspecific intelligence they need Olive Helps healthcare workers get the information they need via Loops in the Loop Library think apps in an app store And with more partners creating Loops every day the impact she can have on our human workforce is endlessbrbrstronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongWe are looking for a Staff Engineer to work with the teams that are changing the way every developer in the country can participate in fixing and improving healthcare These teams build the Olive Helps marketplace the Loop Library including discovery and transactions Olive Original Loops the Loop Development Kit our SDK for building on the open Olive Helps platform and dev tools for our growing developer community Work across these teams as an architect work handson with projects across all the areas of the Loop ecosystem and collaborate with other Helps staff engineers to chart the technical direction of Olive Helps as we deliver fast while building a secure stable resilient scalable platformbrbrstronguEssential Duties And ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliBuild a developer platform and marketplaceliliWork across internal engineering teams partners and customersliliPartner closely with product management compliance and marketing to align engineering and strategic effortsliliPartner closely with cloudops devops and dataops to design and build scalable solutions that deliver on our goalsliliOversee and guide the design development and evolution of core products and supporting systemsliliCoordinate with Product and Engineering leadership to identify both long term and short term needsliliEstablish key metrics and benchmarks for system performanceliliContinually drive our engineering standards code reuse documentation testing etc and levels of service forwardliliMentor and grow the engineering skills of all contributors both via example and by creating new standards for development best practicesliliFunction as a trailblazer for new ideas at times creating complete proofofconcepts to test out potential innovations for viabilityliliCultivate innovation by driving crosscollaboration and execution of projects across multiple teamsliliLead the design of major software components systems and featuresliliDesign develop test deploy maintain and improve the softwarebrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors in Computer Science Computer Engineering or relevant equivalent experiencelili6 years of relevant programming experienceliliExperience in the development of highly maintainable and reliable code using practices such as unit testing integration testing proper code documentation and appropriate loggingliliStrong communication critical thinking and problem solving skillsliliKnowledge of software and application design and architectureliliExperience with public cloud computing  AWS preferredliliExperience in building complex highly scalable software systemsbrliulstronguNicetohavesbrustrongulliOpen source development experienceliliExperience building developer platforms SDKs and developer toolsliliExperience building marketplacesbrliulAt Olive were committed to growing and empowering an inclusive community within our company and industry This is why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of the best and brightest from all backgrounds experiences and perspectives across our organization Research shows that oftentimes women and other minority groups only apply to open roles if they meet 100 of the listed criteria Olive encourages everyone  including women people of color individuals with disabilities and those in the LGBTQIA community  to apply for our available positions even if they dont necessarily check every box on the job descriptionbrbrstronguDisclaimerbrbrustrongemThis job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of evaluate new ways to provide an amazing place to work From retirement planning to a wellness program designed to actively incorporate mental and physical wellness into daily interactions amongst
